mapper.insert: insert into posts (post_title, post_content, post_writer_no, post_file_attached) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writerNo}, #{fileAttached})
insert into post_files (post_no, original_file_name, stored_file_name) values (#{postNo}, #{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName})
mapper.select: select p.post_no as postNo, p.post_title as title, p.post_file_attached as fileAttached, p.post_read_count as readCount, p.post_suggestion_count as suggestionCount, p.post_comment_count as commentCount, p.post_created_date as postCreatedDate, u.user_name as userName from posts p, users u where p.post_writer_no = u.user_no order by post_no desc
